name: Arctic Shores
description:
Arctic Shores’ behaviour-based assessments give every individual the opportunity to show their potential, and every employer the means to see it.

Today, their assessments help employers like BBC, PwC and Capita see beyond the CV – beyond the ordinary measures of human potential. This way, they can counter natural bias, and build the diverse, successful, extraordinary teams they need most. And, what’s more, we’ve also delivered an engaging, stress free experience for over two million candidates – and counting.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: Assessments that give every individual the opportunity to show their potential.
ShortDescription: Arctic Shores exists to help businesses build teams in a better way. Frustrated by the frequent ineffectiveness in recruitment, the founders saw the potential for tools that give everybody the opportunity to excel in the right place. Whatever their background.

Highlights.name: New Approach to Recruitment: Task-Based Assessments
Highlights.description: Arctic Shores offers a new recruitment method that uses task-based assessments to analyze a candidate's skills and potential, rather than their background or what they say they can do.

Highlights.name: Benefits of Using Arctic Shores Assessments
Highlights.description: Arctic Shores assessments reduced turnover by 40% ,increase the diversity of candidate pools and improved the completion rate of assessments.

Highlights.name: Limitations of Traditional Hiring Methods
Highlights.description: Traditional CV-based hiring and question-based psychometric assessments These methods are not effective at predicting candidate success.

enhanced_description: Arctic Shores provides behaviour-based and task-based assessments designed to help businesses build diverse and successful teams by seeing beyond traditional hiring methods like CVs and question-based psychometric assessments. Their tools aim to counter natural bias and give every individual the opportunity to show their potential, regardless of their background, by analyzing skills and potential. The platform delivers an engaging and stress-free experience for candidates, having served over two million individuals. Using Arctic Shores assessments has been shown to reduce turnover by 40%, increase the diversity of candidate pools, and improve assessment completion rates.
